name: ClashofClans
author: TheF1ng3r
short: Get info about users and clans in Clash of Clans!
description: Get info about users army, level, trophies and clans war, members and donations!
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Clash of Clans cog! Use `[p]clash` to see the commands. Make sure to get a token from [The Clash of Clans developer page](http://developer.clashofclans.com) and set it using `[p]clash settoken <token>` to use the cog.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data only if set by the user. Your clan and account tags are the only data saved.
